ptxt.intxrefpoff: Turbocharger Electric Water Pump Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Connect 12 V battery terminals to turbocharger electric water pump terminals.
Check if turbocharger electric water pump operates smoothly without noise.
Check if ammeter indicates the specified current.
If measured current is out of specification, replace turbocharger electric water pump.

spec.title: Turbocharger electric water pump current at 12 V
Turbocharger electric water pump pumping rate:
spec.ptxt: More than 850 L/h. (1796 US pt./h., 1496 Imp pt./h.). at 23 °C, 73 °F
